hero.subtitle: The all-in-one social platform for cross-border payments, messaging, e-commerce, lifestyle, and digital utilities across Africa.

features.subtitle: From instant messaging to cross-border payments, AfriTalks brings together all the tools you need to connect and transact across Africa.

howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started with Africa's most comprehensive social and payment platform is simple and secure.

1.title: Download & Register
1.desc: Download the app and create your account

2.title: Verify & Setup

3.title: Connect & Transact
3.desc: Send money, pay bills, and access services across Africa with just a few taps.

papps.subtitle: The Pan African Payment and Settlement System (PAPSS) enables instant, secure, and cost-effective cross-border payments across participating African countries, making AfriTalks the future of continental connectivity.
papps.availability: AfriTalks is currently available in 15 African countries with more being added regularly.

security.subtitle: We use the same security standards as major banks to protect your data and money, ensuring every transaction is safe and secure.

1.name: End-to-End Encryption
1.desc: All messages and transactions are encrypted using military grade security protocols.

2.name: Biometric Authentication
2.desc: Secure your account with fingerprint, face recognition, or PIN protection.

3.name: Privacy First
